thread.title: The Internet Is Having a Predictable Field Day With President Trump in a Truck
thread.title_full: The Internet Is Having a Predictable Field Day With President Trump in a Truck

author: Ashley Hoffman
title: The Internet Is Having a Predictable Field Day With President Trump in a Truck
text:
Throughout his first few months in office, President Trump has proved himself a ripe meme target , but he has never been quite so meme-able as he was on Thursday when he took the driver‚Äôs seat of a truck .
Before Trump met with trucking industry representatives discuss his health care bill proposals and infrastructure, he climbed into the cab of a semi-truck parked on the White House lawn pretended to drive. The photos of him enjoying the moment have lit up the internet.
‚ÄúI am honored to welcome all of the many truckers and ‚Ä¶ industry leaders to the White House,‚Äù he said during the meeting Trump meeting, according to the Washington Post . ‚ÄúAmerica depends on you, and you work very hard for America.‚Äù

Onlookers lavished the moment by clapping and snapping photos, which naturally became the latest viral meme skewering him from all angles by imagining him in Mad Max: Fury Road and and on a punk rock album cover.
ok what punk band wants to claim this as an album cover? pic.twitter.com/NNAW2lqeJM
